files.patch:
@@ -28,1 +28,1 @@
- * @run compile T8269150.java
+ * @run main T8269150
@@ -33,1 +33,24 @@
-        System.err.println("\u005C\\u005D");
+        String source = """
+            \\]
+            \u005C\]
+            \\u005C]
+            \\\u005D
+            \u005C\u005C]
+            \u005C\\u005D
+            \\u005C\u005D
+            \u005C\u005C\u005D
+            """;
+        String expected = """
+            \\]
+            \\]
+            \\u005C]
+            \\]
+            \\u005C]
+            \\]
+            \\u005C]
+            \\u005C]
+            """;
+
+        if (!source.equals(expected)) {
+            throw new RuntimeException("Unicode escapes not handled correctly");
+        }
